alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 1:24AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sheridan County through 100 AM MDT... At 1223 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Chadron, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rushville, Hay Springs, Intersection of Beaver Creek Road and White Clay Creek Road, Walgren Lake State Recreation Area and Metcalf State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 74 and 93. Highway 250 near mile marker 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
